message: Good [time] [firstName], and welcome to [company]! Room [roomNumber] is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything.
Good [time] [firstName] [lastName], your reservation at [company] is confirmed! Your check in date and time is [checkIn]. We look forward to seeing you!
Good [time] [firstName] [lastName], your check out date and time is [checkOut]. Thank you for staying with us!
